channel.title: Sound Replacement Problem
channel.description: I have the Beta Gravity Gun launching sound as a .wav file. So I was going to replace the original sound of the gravity gun with this one. I made a folder called sounds, then made a folder in that one called weapons, then physcannon in that one and put the .wav file in it. I put it in C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/youaccountname/half-life 2/hl2. I pasted the sounds folder in there and it woun't use that sound in-game. Any help here would be great.

item.title: Sound Replacement Problem
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
It needs to have the exact same filename as the one it replaces.

Read full topic
